coding_practice.title: Single Element in a Sorted Array
coding_practice.description:
You are given a sorted array consisting of only integers where every element appears exactly twice, except for one element which appears exactly once.

Return the single element that appears only once.

Your solution must run in O(log n) time and O(1) space.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用二分搜尋來保持 O(log n) 時間複雜度。
2. 確保 mid 是偶數索引，以便檢查成對元素。
3. 若 nums[mid] == nums[mid+1]，表示單元素在右側，移動 left。
4. 否則，單元素在左側或就是 mid，移動 right。
5. 最終 left 指向單一元素，返回 nums[left]。
